title: Conferences/Workshops
body:
Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners.
Table of Contents  October 2021 November 2021 December 2021 Missing any conference?  October 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     VM World 2021 5-7 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Cloud Quizing Challenge (Azure) 8 Oct - 17 Dec 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST    Kubecon North America 2021. 11-15 Oct 2021 Register Los Angeles PST    All Things Open 2021 18, 19 Oct 2021 Regiser Free + In-person EST    Dashcon 2021 26, 27 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Github Universe 2021 27, 28 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Azure Community Conference 29-31 Oct 2021 Regoster Virtual (Free) IST     November 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     ISTA 2021 18 Nov 2021 Register Virtual      December 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Gophercon 2021 5-8 Dec 2021 Register  PST    AWS re:Invent 2021 Dec 2021 Register Paid PST     Missing any conference Do raise a pull request to this repo to add/update conference information.
